wikipedia_page.main: Dame Sally Ann Powell, DBE (née Vickers; born 2 October 1955) is a local councillor in Great Britain for the Labour Party, and was previously deputy leader of the Local Government Association's Labour Group.

response: Coleman is married to Sally Powell, formerly a senior Labour councillor in Hammersmith and Fulham, as well as a NEC member; they have one son, Jack Coleman. Iain is also an Arsenal supporter.

link_mentions.page: List of Dames Commander of the Order of the British Empire
response: *2001: Ingrid Allen, Eileen Atkins, The Baroness Campbell of Surbiton, Wendy Davies, Karlene Davis, Jill Ellison, Jean Else, Julia Higgins, Sharon Hollows, Thea King, Sheila McKechnie, Sally Powell, Lesley Rees, Mary Richardson, Dela Smith, Marilyn Strathern, Janet Trotter
